item.title: Blog Service WebApp
item.description: Full-stack Web Development : React, Node, Express, MongoDB, Bootstrap, July 2019 â€“ Aug 2019 Developed a web app empowering users to create, update, and comment blogs within the community: Built the back-end with Node, Express, and MongoDB, and supported authentication with Passport Developed the front-end with React and styled the UI with Bootstrap
